display_long_description:
Take flight in Iron Wings: Air Combat – the ultimate single-player VR air warfare experience.

Pilot powerful helicopters and fighter jets through intense mission-based campaigns in fully immersive cockpits. From close-range gunfights to long-range missile strikes, every mission is built for precision, skill, and adrenaline.
[media]
Start your journey in military-grade helicopters — rescue allies, defend bases, and rain rockets on enemy convoys. Unlock advanced aircraft and dominate the skies with supersonic jets, guided missiles, and high-speed dogfights. Each aircraft is equipped with VR-optimized controls, intuitive cockpit interaction, and realistic physics.
[media]
Fly low through jungle canyons, storm desert outposts, and support naval fleets at sea. With 20+ handcrafted missions, a dynamic weapon upgrade system, and cross-aircraft loadouts, Iron Wings delivers deep air combat with replayable tactical variety.
[media]
Key Features:
Realistic VR flight simulation
Helicopter and jet combat missions
Fully interactive in-cockpit controls
Rockets, bombs, MGs, guided missiles
Military-themed environments (urban, desert, ocean)
Unlocks, upgrades, and customizable loadouts
Master the skies. Fly with Iron Wings.


[media]
